description:
Princess Charlotte is 17-years-old. She is the niece of the http://anidb.net/ch90366 [Duke of Normandy] and fourth in the line of succession for the throne of the Albion Kingdom. The Princess has a relatively calm and disarming demeanor, and easily gets along well with others. Her dream is to become Queen and re-unify the country.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Oujo Charlotte
